data.message:
I'm twisted, I'm bitter, I'm jaded
I take a look at my life and fuckin hate it

It should have been better
Workin dead end jobs for a sliver of cheddar

Amounted to nothin
My skills could improve
This writing I do has left me bruised
Purple, black and blue

I bleed hope through a pen
It leaks on the page
I try to be positive but mostly its rage

There is a fire in my soul, Im about to explode
I will leave behind nothin
And Im getting old
I only wish my story was told
Not one lyric, one song, one book or one poem

Its so fuckin sad when talent is wasted
I wanted it bad, so bad I could taste it

My story goes on
Just another episode
My mind is poisoned
There is no antidote

I will live it everyday and pray I find purpose
Live my life for these peanuts
The ringmaster, my circus

Hope michelle Francis 8-6-17
